w:r.w:t: This form is to be used as a "tool" only. The actual performance appraisal is an on going activity between a manager and employees. As such, this form is used to summarize the employee's performance level for this performance period.
List key employee accomplishments since last review.
Improved exisiting QA processes on the project
Made new standard of quality and performed all needed actions to maintain it across several data adapters
Was able to start testing the project fast with tight learning schedule
List employee's key challenges areas. Provide very specific examples.
Goals from the previous performance review (01/02/2011) and their evaluation
This section compares the goals and results achieved during the previous performance period. Actual examples of performance should be given whenever possible.
Goals for the next Performance Review
Set measurable goals for the employee for the next performance review period.
Understand OpenStack components responsibilities, learn to troubleshoot it.
Learn networking principal knowledge: NAT, vlan, vpn, etc.

To be filled in during the performance review session. The plan contains short term professional development activities. It can be split into self-development activities and trainings, courses or internship programs, sponsored by the Company.
Try to develop some fabric scripts using python.
Identify professional blogs, read them and constantly improve professional knowledge.

To be filled in during the performance review session. Manager arrives at an overall conclusion about the employee's performance (i.e. "below expectations", "meet expectations" or "above expectations"), backed up by specific examples and facts.
To be filled in during the performance review session. Manager writes down the decision on salary increase and/or bonus, if applicable.
